title: Riot, can Beemo and Beekeeper Singed sales go to save the bees?
body:
As we all know, bees are now verging on becoming endangered. We need bees to pollinate and make plants grow so we can all live and breathe the oxygen the plants make.

So Riot, can the upcoming Beemo skin and Beekeeper Singed have their sales go towards bee preservation groups?
